title: Sen Son Kon Rak
text:
Sen Son Kon Rak (; ) was a Thai romantic-drama TV series that aired on <a href="Channel%203%20%28Thailand%29">Channel 3</a>, it starred <a href="Pongsakorn%20Mettarikanon">Pongsakorn Mettarikanon</a>, <a href="Kamolned%20Ruengsri">Kamolned Ruengsri</a> and <a href="Pitchapa%20Phanthumchinda">Pitchapa Phanthumchinda</a>. It's the forth drama of project "My hero".
Plot.
Khong Thamdee (<a href="Pongsakorn%20Mettarikanon">Pongsakorn Mettarikanon</a>) who came from broken family became social worker whose purpose in life is to help others. One of latest case is Miao (<a href="Kamolned%20Ruengsri">Kamolned Ruengsri</a>), a broken one.
